title: Bioinspired flavin analogues as organic electrode materials for supercapacitor applications
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,1710-1716
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00001C, Paper

Dipayan Mondal, Ishita Naskar, Melepurath Deepa, Ashutosh Kumar Mishra
With the increasing interest in incorporating redox-active organic molecules as potential materials in energy storage systems, we envisaged a chemical design around naturally occurring redox-active flavin core structure.
